amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce the Mine Safety and Health Administration's Salary and Expenses account by $1,000,000, and to redirect these funds to the Department of Labor's Office of Inspector General's account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
